rooms.description: A spacious area with a modern Bohemian touch. It includes decorative elements aligning with Vastu principles such as the placement of the entrance facing east.

features.details: Use vibrant colors and eclectic furniture to create an inviting atmosphere.
The lobby is oriented with the entrance door in the east, promoting positive energy.

features.details: Incorporates energy-efficient appliances and eco-friendly materials.

rooms.description: An expansive master bedroom featuring a private balcony offering views of the landscape. The design adheres to Vastu by aligning the headboard towards the south.

features.details: Balcony designed with climbing plants and Bohemian decor elements.
